QuestData.Title: Explosive Situation
QuestData.Description: <This crate has fallen into the water. It contains bombs built to take out large mechanical devices.>$B$B<If we had more of them, we could destroy the Venture Company's Reef Breaker.>
QuestData.CompletionText: You'll need more of these bombs if we want to destroy the Reef Breaker.
QuestData.RewardText:
Many battles are won by those who take the initiative and exploit an opportunity. You have spotted an excellent opportunity.
Now you should exploit it!
